TopicTitle: major tom to ground control ... ground control? , HELLO were did everyone go???

Articles.Content: Is there any talk about a mission control??? I have been flying in the cockpit view for a min now and then I was flying an automated rocket/power unit to join the space station when I began to wonder how cool it would be to have the option to remotely control a satellite or a rover i.e. having to install cameras and radios and...and...and you get the idea.

Mods that might help you with this "vision":

Chatterer

RemoteTech

Imagine sending a robot rover to Duna and having to wait 20 minutes to see if it landed safely or not... much less being able to control it in real time... That would make it a bit more challenging.. albeit more realistic. :-)
RemoteTech would definitely be up your alley. Requires a Sat Network in order to control unmanned probes, with the additional caveat that you have to factor in delays.
